name: Maze Jumper v1.0.1
description:
Hello. Welcome to Maze jumper. A 2D Platformer game (not really) that simulates mazes that you can have fun with. Well actually, these are just obstacles trying to get in your way toi the finish line. Just don't look at red and you may restart your progress again. Hit the green barrier to go to the next level.

Made using Blender Game Engine 2.79b. Source code will be sent after its final development (after development is STOPPED.)

Have fun and enjoy!=)
